references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, providing a crucial foundation for extending these techniques to video generation as done in this paper.

references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This paper introduces a significant advancement in video generation, shifting from Unet architectures to transformer-based architectures, influencing the architecture of the method presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: Lora: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces the LoRA method, used in this paper to efficiently fine-tune pre-trained video generation models, highlighting its importance for effective adaptation to new tasks.
